column2: the food here is unbelievable.  If you like Texas beef brisket
column3: you will probably love Smoque BBQ.  The baked beans are insanely good
column4: the cole slaw great as well.  Recently picked up two pounds of brisket
column7: and on the way home a loaf of white bread (yeah
column9: the kind that's not good for you
column10: but is a necessity for Texas BBQ!).  The food is so close to what you'd find in Texas
column11: that during dinner I found myself saying 'dang' a lot
column12: and afterwards had this ridiculous urge to go buy a pick-up truck.  Uh
column13: huh.  Y'all gonna like this place.
